description:second: This is mainly written by PHP.

scripts:second.publish:second: FASTLY_SERVICE_ID=$(cat .env | grep FASTLY_SERVICE_ID= | cut -d '=' -f2) && fastly backend create --version latest --name=origin_0 --address=$PROJECT_DOMAIN.glitch.me --autoclone --service-id=$FASTLY_SERVICE_ID && fastly domain create --version latest --name=$PROJECT_DOMAIN.global.ssl.fastly.net --autoclone --service-id=$FASTLY_SERVICE_ID && fastly service-version activate --version latest --autoclone --service-id=$FASTLY_SERVICE_ID
